publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-136 Mr Andy Kerr: Fireworks Bill - UK Legislation-That the Parliament endorses the principle of making enabling regulations for the supply and use of fireworks as set out in the Fireworks Bill and agrees that those provisions in the Bill that relate to devolved matters should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Tavish Scott*

S2M-136 Mr Andy Kerr: Fireworks Bill - UK Legislation—That the Parliament endorses the principle of making enabling regulations for the supply and use of fireworks as set out in the Fireworks Bill and agrees that those provisions in the Bill that relate to devolved matters should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Tavish Scott

S2M-136 Mr Andy Kerr: Fireworks Bill - UK Legislation—That the Parliament endorses the principle of making enabling regulations for the supply and use of fireworks as set out in the Fireworks Bill and agrees that those provisions in the Bill that relate to devolved matters should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Tavish Scott
